meanings.definition: To cut apart or separate into pieces
meanings.sent1: She dissects the frog in science class.
meanings.sent2: The chef dissects the chicken before cooking it.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat dissects the toy mouse to see how it works.
meanings.sent4: The detective dissects the evidence to solve the case.
meanings.sent5: The surgeon dissects the tumor with precision.

meanings.definition: To analyze or examine in detail
meanings.sent1: He dissects the poem to understand its meaning.
meanings.sent2: The scientist dissects the data to draw conclusions.
meanings.sent3: The student dissects the math problem to find the solution.
meanings.sent4: The researcher dissects the theory to uncover its flaws.
meanings.sent5: The historian dissects the document for hidden clues.
